titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Daniel W. Lindsey
CWG13777

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To D. W. Lindsey Inspr Genl Dr.

row.cell: To. Services rendered in organizing and administering the Enrolled Militia, the State Guard and other State Troops.

body.p: Approved, and the Q. M. Genl is Ordered to pay the Same out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 30th of July 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Two Hundred and Twenty five Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To D. W. Lindsey Inspr Genl Dr.

row.cell: To. Services rendered in organizing and administering the Enrolled Militia, the State Guard and other State Troops.

body.p: Approved, and the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay Same out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 30 of July 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Two Hundred and Twenty five Dollars, and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
D. W. Lindsey
Dollars 225.00/100
Paid July 30th, 1864.
13
